1.0.name: wordpress/multi-mailchimp-list-manager
1.0.description:
Allows users to subscribe/unsubscribe from multiple MailChimp lists with Twitter-like user interface.

Admin can specify which MailChimp lists should be available for subscription and assign custom descriptions for them.

List can be shown using shortcode [mmc-display-lists] or widget. The plugs support both loged-in and not loged-in users

Communication with MailChimp is based on MCAPI mini v1.3 downloaded from here The user interface is based on CSS3 stylesheet created by Tim Hudson here.

Demo

View Widget demo - Scroll down and look at the right site for the Subscribe for JumpStartCTO Blog

View Page Demo

Note
